description: This dashboard works with postgres_exporter for prometheus

panels.title: General Counters, CPU, Memory and File Descriptor Stats

panels.description: Average user and system CPU time spent in seconds.
panels.title: Average CPU Usage

panels.description: Virtual and Resident memory size in bytes, averages over 5 min interval
panels.title: Average Memory Usage

panels.description:
pg_stat_database_xact_commit Number of transactions in this database that have been committed

pg_stat_database_xact_rollback Number of transactions in this database that have been rolled back
panels.title: Transactions

panels.description:
# HELP pg_stat_database_tup_updated Number of rows updated by queries in this database
# TYPE pg_stat_database_tup_updated counter
panels.title: Update data

panels.description: # HELP pg_stat_database_tup_fetched Number of rows fetched by queries in this database
panels.title: Fetch data (SELECT)

panels.description:
# HELP pg_stat_database_tup_inserted Number of rows inserted by queries in this database
	# TYPE pg_stat_database_tup_inserted counter
panels.title: Insert data

panels.description: # HELP pg_stat_database_tup_returned Number of rows returned by queries in this database
panels.title: Return data

panels.description:
# HELP pg_stat_database_tup_deleted Number of rows deleted by queries in this database
	# TYPE pg_stat_database_tup_deleted counter
panels.title: Delete data

panels.description: Total amount of data written to temporary files by queries in this database. All temporary files are counted, regardless of why the temporary file was created, and regardless of the log_temp_files setting.
panels.title: Temp File (Bytes)

targets.legendFormat: write_time - Total amount of time that has been spent in the portion of checkpoint processing where files are written to disk.
sync_time - Total amount of time that has been spent in the portion of checkpoint processing where files are synchronized to disk.

title: PostgreSQL Monitoring
